item.title: OpenAI 的 "博士级 "GPT-5 与许多用户的需求相去甚远
item.description: 自 GPT-5 发布以来，OpenAI 在过去一周的大部分时间里都在努力解决用户反弹的问题。另外：与人工智能 "教父"、诺贝尔奖获得者杰弗里-辛顿的访谈。但首先...【原文：OpenAI has spent much of the past week since launching GPT-5 trying to address a user backlash. Plus: An interview with AI “godfather” and Nobel laureate Geoffrey Hinton. But first…】

item.title: 据称特朗普政府将讨论入股英特尔公司
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，特朗普政府正在与英特尔公司谈判，希望美国政府有可能入股这家陷入困境的芯片制造商，帮助支持该公司扩大国内生产。【原文：The Trump administration is in talks with Intel Corp. to have the US government potentially take a stake in the beleaguered chipmaker, helping support the company’s effort to expand domestic manufacturing, according to people familiar with the plan.】

item.title: 英伟达支持的 Lambda 公司希望以超过 40 亿美元的估值获得融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，云基础设施公司Lambda Inc.正在与投资者洽谈一轮融资，在可能的首次公开募股之前，该公司的估值可能达到40亿至50亿美元。【原文：Lambda Inc., a cloud infrastructure firm which counts Nvidia Corp. among its backers, is in talks with investors about a funding round that could value the company at $4 billion to $5 billion ahead of a potential initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Centerbridge 为 MeridianLink 借入 14 亿美元私人债务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，一批私人信贷公司正在提供近 14 亿美元的贷款，以支持 Centerbridge Partners 收购金融软件平台 MeridianLink Inc.【原文：A group of private credit firms are providing nearly $1.4 billion of loans to support Centerbridge Partners’ acquisition of financial software platform MeridianLink Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 电网监察机构称数据中心需要自备电源
item.description: 美国最大电网的独立监督机构表示，希望接入该系统的数据中心必须自备电源。【原文：Data centers looking to connect to the largest US grid must bring their power supply, the system’s independent watchdog says.】

item.title: Orsted 因美国海上风电市场风险被 S&P 下调评级
item.description: Orsted A/S被S&P全球评级公司下调至投资级的最低级别，原因是随着特朗普政府停止该行业的发展，Orsted A/S的美国海上风电业务面临越来越大的风险。【原文：Orsted A/S was downgraded to the lowest tier of investment grade by S&P Global Ratings on increasing risks to its US offshore wind business as the Trump Administration moves to halt the sector’s development.】

item.title: 华尔街的股息税 "躲猫猫 "出现在固定收益 ETF 中
item.description: 一对新的债券交易所交易基金让投资者比以往任何时候都更容易避免因支付票息而缴税。【原文：A pair of new bond exchange-traded funds is making it easier than ever for investors to avoid taxes on coupon payments.】

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特出现在亚马逊的凯尔斯兄弟播客中。赞助商没有。
item.description:
有史以来最受欢迎的播客中有一集播出了零广告

。【原文：

One of the most popular podcast episodes of all time featured zero host-read ads

】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金称数据可能显示美国消费者在七月有所改善
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）表示，他看到有迹象表明，美国消费者的消费环境在经历了年初的疲软之后，在 7 月份有所改善。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin said he sees signs that the environment for US consumers improved in July after weakness earlier in the year.】

item.title: 宾夕法尼亚大学在高等教育借款热潮中贷款 3 亿美元
item.description: 美国名牌大学的借贷狂潮丝毫没有放缓的迹象。【原文：The borrowing spree for elite US universities shows no signs of slowing down.】

item.title: 特朗普施压，普林斯顿计划削减新预算
item.description: 普林斯顿大学正在实施新一轮的成本削减，理由是特朗普政府削减高等教育经费的压力以及对经济的担忧。【原文：Princeton University is implementing a new round of cost cuts, citing pressure from the Trump administration’s funding reductions in higher education as well as economic concerns.】

item.title: 乌拉圭 Dlocal 因业绩和更高的指导目标股价大涨 35
item.description: 周四，乌拉圭支付服务提供商 Dlocal 公布了好于预期的季度业绩，并上调了今年的业绩指导，此后该公司股价创下四年来最大涨幅。【原文：Shares for payments firm Dlocal rallied the most in four years Thursday after the Uruguayan payment services provider reported better-than-expected quarterly results and increased its guidance for the year.】

item.title: 前杰富瑞基金经理被控参与水机庞氏骗局
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：A former Jefferies Financial Group Inc. hedge fund manager has been charged with fraud by federal prosecutors in New York for allegedly directing the purchase of nearly $100 million in bonds tied to a water-vending machine business.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚总理誓言大幅削减开支以避免违约风险
item.description: 罗马尼亚新任总理警告说，除非政府迅速控制住多年来挥霍无度的开支，否则罗马尼亚可能会面临违约。【原文：Romania’s new prime minister warned his country could face a default unless the government quickly reins in years of lavish spending.】

item.title: 最高法院暂时批准密西西比州社交媒体年龄验证法
item.description: 美国最高法院回绝了美国最大的社交媒体平台，允许密西西比州暂时执行一项法律，该法律将在法律诉讼进行期间强制执行年龄验证和父母同意要求。【原文：The US Supreme Court has rebuffed the country’s biggest social media platforms, letting Mississippi enforce a law for now that will impose age-verification and parental-consent requirements while the legal fight goes forward.】

item.title: 以太币交易所交易基金终于觉醒
item.description:
在经历了缓慢的起步之后，比特币的小弟弟 终于以ETF的形式起飞了。在本期万亿节目中，我们将讨论比特币最近的突然流入。【原文：

After a slow start, Bitcoin’s little brother is finally taking off in ETF form. In this episode of Trillions, we discuss its recent and very sudden inflows.

】

item.title: 贝莱德的 GIP 主导了价值 110 亿美元的沙特天然气资产交易
item.description: 在沙特阿美寻求从基础设施资产中筹集现金之际，贝莱德公司领导的一个集团签署了一项价值 110 亿美元的租赁协议，涉及沙特阿美的天然气设施。【原文：A BlackRock Inc.-led group signed an $11 billion lease deal involving Saudi Aramco natural gas facilities as the state producer seeks to raise cash from infrastructure assets.】

item.title: 派拉蒙大幅跃升唤起 "备忘录-股票 "时代，挤压风险飙升
item.description: 新合并的媒体公司派拉蒙天空舞蹈公司（Paramount Skydance Corp.【原文：A double-digit rally over two trading sessions for the newly-merged media company Paramount Skydance Corp. is recalling the meme-stock frenzy of 2021 for at least one Wall Street analyst.】

item.title: 美联储逆回购机制使用量降至 2021 年 4 月以来最低点
item.description: 由于财政部发行更多短期债务为不断增长的赤字融资，吸引现金从市场流动性的一个关键来源流走，美联储主要机构的资金停放量降至四年多来的最低水平。【原文：Funds parked at a major Federal Reserve facility dropped to the lowest level in more than four years as the Treasury Department issues more short-dated debt to finance the growing deficit, luring cash away from a key source of market liquidity.】

item.title: 中国的资产负债表看起来确实在衰退
item.description:
这正是理查德-顾所担心的。【原文：

This is what Richard Koo worried about.

】

item.title: 2007 年的回声萦绕美元，美联储在通胀中面临宽松风险
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，美元将面临美联储在年通胀率不断上升的情况下削减利率的有毒组合，这种破坏性情景上一次出现还是在近二十年前。【原文：The dollar is set for a toxic mix of a Federal Reserve cutting interest rates in the face of rising annual inflation, a damaging scenario last seen nearly two decades ago, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 据说债权人 Lumina 正在酝酿出售 HIG 旗下 Kora Saude 公司的债务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，投资公司 Lumina Capital Management 在收购巴西医疗保健公司 Kora Saude Participações SA 一大部分当地票据不到一年后，正在考虑出售该公司的债务。【原文：Investment firm Lumina Capital Management is weighing a debt sale tied to Brazilian health-care company Kora Saude Participações SA less than a year after acquiring a chunk of the company’s local notes, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯计划在无人机袭击期间延长汽油出口禁令
item.description: 由于乌克兰无人机袭击破坏了主要炼油厂，俄罗斯计划将禁止燃料生产商出口汽油的禁令延长至 9 月，以确保国内供应。【原文：Russia plans to extend its ban on gasoline exports from fuel producers through September to ensure domestic supplies as Ukrainian drone attacks disrupt major refineries.】

item.title: 交易所运营商 MIAX 首次公开募股 3.45 亿美元后大涨 36
item.description: 迈阿密国际控股公司（Miami International Holdings Inc.【原文：Miami International Holdings Inc. rose 36% from its initial public offering price as the exchange operator became the most recent financial services business to get a warm welcome in its trading debut.】

item.title: 加航警告因劳资纠纷取消航班将引发混乱
item.description: 加拿大航空公司（Air Canada）表示，在可能出现的劳工中断之前，该公司将结束运营，并将继续与空乘人员进行谈判。【原文：Air Canada said it remains available to continue negotiations with its flight attendants as it winds down operations ahead of a potential labor disruption.】

item.title: 纳米比亚认为采用南非计划的较低消费物价指数目标有好处
item.description: 纳米比亚央行行长表示，纳米比亚央行认为采用南非储备银行提出的较低通胀目标有好处。【原文：Namibia’s central bank sees benefits to adopting a lower inflation target proposed by the South African Reserve Bank, its governor said.】

item.title: 壳牌支持的 Raízen 寻求新资金，股价创历史新低
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）支持的巴西糖业和乙醇巨头正在寻求新的资金，因为错误的押注导致其债务激增。周四，该公司股价跌至历史最低点。【原文：A Brazilian sugar and ethanol powerhouse backed by Shell Plc is seeking fresh capital after bad bets led to a surge in debt. The shares tumbled to an all-time low on Thursday.】

item.title: 油价疲软拖累贸易，俄罗斯出口连续第五个月下滑
item.description: 由于全球商品价格疲软继续拖累贸易，俄罗斯 6 月份出口连续第五个月萎缩。【原文：Russia’s exports contracted for a fifth month in June as weaker global commodity prices continued to weigh on trade.】

item.title: 生产成本超过消费价格，S&P 500 利润面临风险
item.description: 美国企业提高利润率和维持美股涨势的努力面临着一个关键障碍：消费者价格和生产者价格之间的差距不断扩大，关税的不确定性又加剧了这一问题。【原文：Corporate America’s effort to boost margins and sustain US stock gains faces a key hurdle: a widening gap between consumer and producer prices, compounded by tariff uncertainties.】

item.title: 人工智能初创企业 Cohere 获得新一轮融资，估值达 68 亿美元
item.description: 人工智能初创公司Cohere Inc.在新一轮融资中筹集了5亿美元，这是该公司在向企业和政府销售人工智能服务方面与大型科技公司竞争的一部分。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Cohere Inc. has raised $500 million in a new round of funding, part of a bid to compete with larger tech firms in selling AI services to businesses and governments.】
